title: Parapet (5U87)
text:
Set:	Battle of Helm's Deep
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Rohan
Twilight:	1
Card Type:	Condition
Game Text:	Fortification. Plays to your support area. Archery: Spot 2 [Rohan] Men to remove 2 tokens from a machine or to make the minion archery total -3. Discard this condition.
Lore:	Upon the spur of rock from the cliff stood high walls of ancient stone.
Rarity:	U
